# Example Curl Command

```bash
curl -X POST https://www.giveme.my/preprod/collateral/ \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{
        "tx_body": ""
      }'
```

```bash
curl -X POST https://www.giveme.my/mainnet/collateral/ \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{
        "tx_body": ""
      }'
```

# Testing
```bash
curl -X POST http://127.0.0.1:8000/preprod/collateral/ \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{
        "tx_body":
          ""
      }'
```

# this should fail now
```bash
curl -X POST https://www.giveme.my/preprod/collateral/ \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -H 'Host: 0.0.0.0' \
  -d '{
        "tx_body": ""
      }'
```
